channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3019] Ouch! That hurts [Pic]
[+1987] Superman's challenged half-brother [pic]
[+1749] Dear Apple: What we want to see for iPhone 4.0
item.description: A week ago we asked readers to help us tell Apple what you want in the next iPhone: the OS, the apps, the hardware. Within two hours, I had over two hundred emails in my inbox. Within four days, the email total topped 1,100. As I was shifting and sorting through all your suggestions, one thing became clear: you love the iPhone.

item.title: [+1730] Angry Man In Burger King Gets Instant Karma!
item.description: Angry man in burger king throws a drink at the wall and then goes to smash the door with a chair. Little did he know Karma was waiting for him!

item.title: [+1696] 'So I hear you like literature' (PIC)
item.description: Col. Landa is a hero in my book.

item.title: [+1295] USB 3.0 Finally Arrives
item.description: Adoption is faster than with previous versions -- but we want more, now. Here’s why

item.title: [+1235] Another dose of Martian awesomeness (PIC)
item.description: If someone woke me out of a sound sleep and forced me at gunpoint to say which is my favorite camera in the solar system, they’d probably have to shoot me. But I think that HiRISE onboard the Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter would be in the top three. And it’s pictures like this one that put it there:

item.title: [+1196] Facebook's Zuckerberg: I know that people don't want privacy
item.description: In an interview in front of a live audience, the Facebook founder says if he were starting all over again, he'd make everyone's information public. Because that is the "social norm."

item.title: [+1192] Handshake Please! [PIC]
[+1186] Cat Relaxing on a Comfy Pillo-- wait, what? (PIC)
item.description: Oddly enough, both seem quite relaxed.

item.title: [+1127] Patton Oswalt: Why Conan is better than Leno (audio)
item.description: The brilliant Patton Oswalt gives a comedian's analysis of Jay Leno and Conan O'Brien shakeup.

item.title: [+1112] Sarah Palin Joins Fox News
item.description: The New York Times says the Fox News Network has confirmed that former Alaska governor Sarah plain will become a regular contributor to the network in a multi-year deal.

item.title: [+1070] Authors: McCain aides worried Palin was 'mentally unstable'
item.description: A book due out this week by political journalists John Heilemann and Mark Halperin has all the right politicos sweating and backpedaling, from John McCain to the Senate majority leader, and even Bill and Hillary Clinton. But it's former lawmaker Sarah Palin who takes it on the nose. -=W/ VIDEO=-

item.title: [+1053] Could we be in for 30 years of global COOLING?
item.description: Britain's big freeze is the start of a worldwide trend towards colder weather that seriously challenges global warming theories, eminent scientists claimed yesterday.

item.title: [+964] Conan & Michael Cera "Battle Dance" Jersey Shore Style
item.description: Michael and Conan break into a little "controlled mayhem!"

item.title: [+799] Ex-MLB Slugger Mark McGwire Admits Using Steroids
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) -- Mark McGwire finally came clean Monday, admitting he used steroids when he broke baseball's home run record in 1998.

item.title: [+794] 6 Insane Fan Theories That Actually Make Great Movies Better
[+794] OMG I Found Milton From Office Space! [PIC]
item.description: ... while giving my girlfriend the "O" face. Nah, I lied - I'm a true Digger, I have no girlfriend.

item.title: [+791] Reporter breaks 'unbreakable' phone
item.description: Reporter Dan Simmons managed to break a mobile phone marketed as "unbreakable", during a demonstration at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas.

item.title: [+721] It Takes 9 Hours of Sex to Burn Off 6 Chicken McNuggets
item.description: Six pieces have 290 calories and 17 grams of fat. Sounds like a lot, right? Easy enough to fix: a few hours of vigorous sex will burn that off! Just 9.06 hours in bed will take care of those six McNuggets.
